document.forum_title: Latest News on One News Page - Top Headlines and News Videos
document.discussion_title: Anthony Joshua to Face Dominic Breazeale For the Title
document.topic_text: Transcript: Anthony Joshua to Face Dominic Breazeale For the Title British fighter Anthony Joshua will face the undefeated American Dominic Breazeale in the first defense of his IBF world heavyweight title on 25 June. The 30-year-old Breazeale, who competed at the 2012 Olympic Games where Joshua won his gold medal, will travel to London’s 02 Arena for his first fight at world level. His selection as Joshua’s opponent comes after a long period of him being monitored as a potential challenger, according to the champion. Recent related news Former quarterback Breazeale takes on Anthony Joshua on 25 June Independent
